gw.api.util

Class ScriptingUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.util.ScriptingUtil

  • public class ScriptingUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utilities for working reflectively with the Gosu layer.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IScriptabilityModifier SCRIPTABLE_LEVEL_MODIFIER
      The highest scriptability level. Can be used in conjunction with the Gosu reflection framework to determine whether a specific property or method on an entity is accessible from Gosu.
